name: d3-horizon-chart
description: D3 Plugin that draws horizon charts using canvas.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -g d3-array:d3,d3-axis:d3,d3-scale:d3,d3-selection:d3 -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-horizon-chart.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-horizon-chart.js -c -m -o build/d3-horizon-chart.min.js
